name: Planet Madness
description: Welcome to the Void, you have been brought here to complete an important mission. In this place, you have the power to create planets. However, you will be constantly attacked by asteroids. Destroy the planets by pressing the left button of your mouse. Create the planets by pressing left shift. As usual, planets orbits orbit around the sun. You gain money to create planets by destroying asteroids, also each planets produce money depending in their distance to the sun.  The game ends when an asteroid destroy your sun, so, be careful!!!
